value.title: DAX Fridays #200: Calculate the MAX of a measure
value.excerpt: In today's video, we will go through how to calculate the MAX (or MIN) of a measure and how to troubleshoot it to get the correct results.  Happy Friday!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.excerpt: Have you ever got this error message?: A table of multiple values was supplied where a single value was expected ? value.title: DAX Fridays! #30: SEARCH vs FIND
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! tutorial we are going to go though examples on how to use two DAX functions: SEARCH and FIND  SEARCH and FIND DAX functions are used to find the number of characters at which a specific word is found in a column. value.title: DAX Fridays! #34: UNICHAR and REPT
value.excerpt: In today‚Äôs video I will show you  two new DAX functions: UNICHAR and REPT  UNICHAR DAX function allows you to display unicode symbols in Power BI and Excel.   REPT allows you to repeat text using DAX.  With both functions you can create a star rating visualization among other cool things.  Chris Web
